categories: American West, Card Game, Dice, Humor
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Negotiation, Push Your Luck, Semi-Cooperative Game, Turn Order: Pass Order, Victory Points as a Resource

name: Pizza Rush
description:
Players run a restaurant from welcoming the clients to adding the ingredients on the pizzas, while doing the accounting and service. The game only lasts a few minutes but it's total chaos.
Pizza Rush is a real time cooperative game published in France.

name: Spectrum: A Game Of Colors
description:
The Spectrum Board Game Kickstarter will include the Spectrum Cards & d12 dice expansions. Backers of Spectrum will receive the 168 card Spectrum Cards Deck Expansion & the d12 dice expansion free with the Spectrum board game.

Spectrum the board game was debuted at Pax Unplugged in 2022 where it was named one of the Top 10 Indie Gems at Pax Unplugged. The addition of the Kickstarter Exclusive free Spectrum Cards and d12 Dice expansions to give you over a dozen more Spectrum games to play!

Spectrum Game List

Spectrum Board Game

The strategic, abstract game of colors.
You decide what pawns to move, but the dice determine where.
You may only enter on the outer rim on one of the 6 primary colors.
To enter an intermediate color, a pawn must already be on the board.
Jump and capture opponents on the way to controlling a set amount of the 12 colors.
The game starts with 2 dice, and a 3rd and 4th die get added to the game as it advances.

Spectrum Cards Expansion

168 card deck based on the Spectrum Board Game.
Featuring 12 colors and 12 unique wild cards it is bigger than 3 standard decks of cards!
The 12 suits enable twists on classic card games that give them a new, exciting, colorful life.
Combine the cards with the Spectrum Board Game, or use the Spectrum Cards for stand alone games.

Spectrum Board Game Variants with Cards

Spectrum Weights - Set asymmetric values for capturing each of the 12 colors. Highest score wins.

Spectrum Missions- Adds a second, stealthy win condition. Control 5 secret spaces on the board and win by stealth.

Spectrum Portals- Players own spaces on the board that allow them to activate transporters.

Spectrum Draw & Move - Replace the dice with the Spectrum Cards for a unique Draw & Move mechanic.

Spectrum Card Games

Spectrumo
Uno Spectrum Style with 12 unique wilds to spice it up.

Spectrump
A trump game where trump is bad, and good.

Spectrum Solitaire
The ultimate solitaire challange, 12 tableau and foundation piles to unpuzzle and conquer.

Spectrum Cribbage
Bring back an old favorite with new numbers to aim for.

Spectrum 500
Rummy 500 with 12 suits. What could be more fun?

Spectrum Casino
An obscure, classic card game brought back to life by the Spectrum Cards.

Spectrum Poker
Poker with 12 suits and new hands. Play for jelly beans but please don't gamble.

Spectrum d12 Dice Expansion

Five d12 custom Spectrum dice with all 12 spectrum colors on the die.
All new rules and fun. Use 3, 4, or 5 d12 Spectrum dice with all the colors on them!

Play Spectrum, and all the variants, using the d12 dice and the Spectrum Cards.
Use both the 5 d12 dice and the original Spectrum d6 dice for more unique games!

A New 9 Dice Spectrum Variant called Spectrum Escape!
Try to escape from the Spectrum board in this strategic & colorful king of the mountain game.

Roll & Color - A New Original Spectrum Roll & Write Game!
Try to score as high as you can, while making colorful dice sets, and series.

-description from designer
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Different Dice Movement, Roll / Spin and Move, Static Capture

name: Top Up Your Pizza
description:
Who doesn’t like pizza? Get ready to experience an extremely fun family time with this easy to learn yet very challenging “ TOP UP YOUR PIZZA” game. But don’t be carried away by the cuteness, this game will have you on your toes throughout while improving your strategic,problem solving and observation skills.

All you have to do is top your pizza slices with matching toppings and score maximum points !

name: Ring it on!: Disney Edition
description: Players race to make four-of-a-kind sets by swiftly swapping cards over and over in search of matches! Move fast and watch the cards because they can switch at any time! Find a set and ring that bell—ding!—and you’re one step closer to making all of your matches to win! It’s easy-to-learn, fast-paced excitement for the whole family!

name: Bites: Double Bites
description: Doubles the trail or allows additional players.

name: Kings of Rome
description:
A game that recreates the first period of the roman epoch.

The players can control the political and military life of the newborn city, struggling to achieve supremacy over the other players and to survive to the multiple threats posed by hostiles neighbors, like Samnites, Etruscans and so on.

The game comes with separate rules for solitaire and multiplayer play.

During a turn of the solo play the player maneuvers the armies of Rome and may fight battles, lay sieges and intimidate and/or blackmail AI opponents. (No bot provided).

In the multiplayer game, the player that controls the King of Rome can choose the same actions of the solo game. At the same time, the players that control the other patrician families in Rome struggle to avoid an early victory of the King maneuvering the enemy peoples, the Senate and the Pontifex maximus to contrast the King's plans.

The game ends at the 24th turn, but sudden victories (and defeats) are possible, if certain conditions happens. IP points are the dial that indicates the victory of a player. They are accumulated (and lost) turn by turn in many ways.

-description from developer

name: Herdvana
description:
Stack, steal, and secure your herds in this fast-paced and exciting game. Play individually, or in teams, and work to outwit your opponents on your way to achieving Herdvana and victory. A bit of strategy, a bit of luck, and a whole lot of fun. Great for big groups, or even one-on-one action, each game will be a unique experience!

On a players turn they can take 1 of 7 actions: Create a herd of two animals, add to a herd, draw from the discard to add to a herd or create a herd, place a farmer to protect a herd, play an animal to steal an opponent's herd, play an alien to abduct a farmer, or discard. The game is played until the deck runs out. Herds are scored based on the cards value on the animals, and players score a bonus 10 points if the get a Herdvana (all 8 of an animal type).
categories: Animals, Card Game, Farming, Party Game
mechanics: Set Collection, Take That, Team-Based Game

name: Cloud Nine: A Game of Wonderful Things
description:
Cloud Nine: A Game of Wonderful Things celebrates the things in life that bring us joy, with illustrations by Lisa Congdon.

Do you love campfires or video games? Wandering around a new city or falling in love? How about the feeling of losing track of time, being out in nature, or listening to music that moves you? We all have special things that make us feel alive and connected to the world, and playing Cloud Nine was made to share them with each other.

In Cloud Nine, players choose from over 300 Cloud Cards to build their personalized collection of nine treasured things, with 50 Action Cards to mix up gameplay.
The Cloud Cards represent a wide assortment of things and experiences, big and small, that bring out a range of emotions from joy and happiness to wonder and amazement, as well as simple pleasures like favorite foods.
Each Cloud Card also includes questions that players can use as conversation prompts to learn more about why we love the things we do.

How to play: To start the game, draw nine random Cloud Cards from the deck and place them face up in a 3x3 grid, known as “the Sky.” The Sky is shared by all players, and must always be filled as cards are taken.
On each turn, players can choose from one of two options:
Take a Cloud Card from the Sky. If you see something you love in the Sky, take the Cloud Card and add it to your own collection. Replace the card you took with a new card from the deck.
Remove a row of Cloud Cards from the Sky. If you don’t love any of the Cloud Cards, you can discard an entire row in any direction, replacing it with three new cards from the deck to choose from. If you still don’t love any of the cards, your turn ends without adding a new card to your collection.
If any card you’ve drawn from the deck is an Action Card, you must use it immediately, following its instructions before ending your turn.
The first player to collect nine Cloud Cards is the winner! Now try spinning all nine cards into a story about how you’d love to spend one beautiful day packed full with things you love. (Bonus: Go out and do it!)

—description from the publisher

name: Genotype: Bernard Promo Card
description:
Originally available as part of the Man vs. Meeple Season 4 Kickstarter.

You may include this card as a bonus ability.

During setup, place this card next to the University Action space. Whenever a player takes the University action, they take this card (from the University or another player) and places it in front of them.

During the Plant Breeding Phase, the player who currently has this card gains a single "3rd shift" pick.

After any 2nd shift picks have been made, they may take any 1 die like normal. Research shift picks will then begin in the normal player order.

name: Block and Key: Hindsight Adventurer Promo Card
description:
Originally available as part of the Man vs. Meeple Season 4 Kickstarter.

- Hindsight allows you, once per turn, you may claim 1 completed Key without having contributed a face to it.

name: Mosaic: Man vs. Meeple 2022 Promo Pack
description:
Originally available as part of the Man vs. Meeple Season 4 Kickstarter.

5-card expansion promo pack containing 5 Technology Cards not in the base game:

Codex
Garrisons
Paper
Spice Trade
Trireme

All are marked as promo cards with an star in the top right corner.

name: Slapburger
description:
Slapburger is a fast paced new card game for family game night! It's a card slapping twist on Slap Jack, War & Slamwich. Great Christmas stocking stuffer card games for families, adults & children!

Fun Games for Family Game Night - Divide the deck of cards among players. Be first to slap the pile when a SlapBurger Card, Double Decker or Sandwich is laid. Last person with all the cards wins!
Best Family Games for Kids and Adults, Teenagers & Seniors! Easy to learn card games for kids ages 4-8, kids games ages 8-12, teens, & adults! Enjoy group games up to 6 people or two player games Great plane & car travel games, camping games, birthday party games, couples games, indoor recess games for classroom. 2.5"x3.5" deck of cards are easy to pack for family fun
Donut and Lola is veteran and family owned. We created Slapburger because we love kid games & family board games while spending time together away from electronics. We hope you enjoy it!

—description from the publisher

name: Stuka Leader Exp #2: Eastern Front #2
description:
Includes 3 new campaigns, 5 new targets, 2 new aircraft, 2 new bandits, a new bomber and 3 new events.

Relive the end of the Russian Invasion. Fight to defend the Fatherland with such aircraft as:
Ju-87g Tankbuster
Do-335 Fastest propeller aircraft in WW2
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Wargame, World War II

name: Stuka Leader Exp #4: Mediterranean #2
description:
Includes 3 new campaigns, 3 new targets, 3 new aircraft, 2 new bandits, 2 new bombers and 2 new events.

Later war battles in the Mediterranean and North Africa!
Fly such aircraft as:
Me-109f Fighter
Do-217 Medium Bomber
Re.2001 Italian Fighter

name: Monsters Love Vegas
description:
Monsters Love Vegas is a flip-and-write game in which you trade Vegas items for better Vegas items!

The goal is to have the best items worth the most points at the end of twelve turns. On your turn, you trade items you have on your player sheet for what is available from one of the nine cards. New cards are flipped randomly each turn, giving you new options for trade.

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Market, Multi-Use Cards, Paper-and-Pencil, Resource Queue, Set Collection

name: EspañaIQ
description: EspañaIQ is a game for Spain lovers and its communities. You will be able to do 400 questions with 3 answers, with many topics. From Altamira to present, geography, gastronomy, illustrious personalities, artists, scientists, prodigious inventions, athletes, this game will help you discover the most fascinating stories and facts of our lands and neighbors.

name: Craftin' Race
description:
The head of the crafter’s guild has retired and we must find a successor. Tradition is that the best two crafters create two sets of gems as fast as possible. The first to get them will be crowned “Master Crafter” and rule the guild. The other… Nobody really remembers who comes second.

This is the chance you’ve been waiting for! Get ready to race for fame, money, and a well deserved promotion.

Roll your dice, obtain materials, and craft gems or acquire improvements. Would you invest in tooling, or go ahead crafting gems trusting your luck?

---

Each colored dice has different odds of generating resources. i.e. yellow dice are more likely to generate green resources, and brown dice are more likely to generate blue.

Each turn you will roll your dice to generate resources and choose how to invest them: acquiring dice, purchasing cards to tweak your dice rolling, or just crafting gems. Some are much harder to craft than others!

Chose wisely and let the faster craftsman win!
categories: Card Game, Dice, Print & Play, Renaissance

name: Pim Pam
description:
Pim Pam is a ping pong themed card game that's quick to learn and quick to play. It's perfect for when you only have a few minutes but want to have some fun. The 18 cards fit easily into your pocket or purse so you can take it anywhere!

Two players are matched up against each other and compete in a fast game of ping pong. Players take turns playing a card from their hand. You can only play a card if it is one less, the same, or one more than the card in play. If you're unable to play a card your opponent scores a point. First to 5 points wins!

name: Awkward Family Photos Greatest Hits: Expansion #1
description:
Inside this box are 100 comedic, dramatic, thrilling and action-packed movie lines you, your friends and family will use to caption 40 hilarious images from the hit website, AwkwardFamilyPhotos.com.

With easy rules and no movie knowledge required, play with the enclosed cards or add them to the original game for hours of fun.

name: Blurgh
description:
A nsfw party card game of bad language, crazy drawings and hilarious mistakes.

How to play

Draw each other using our patented colour-popping scratch cards.
Add your faces to the game, along with some challenge cards, then deal.
Take turns to flip over a card and shout the answer based on a few simple, yet tricky, rules.
Your card could be a colour, a swear word, or even your own face! Each card is designed to mess with your head – the more mistakes, the more laughs.
If you get the answer wrong (or take too long) you’ll be forced to pick up cards. Get it right and you lose that card. The first player to lose all their cards wins.



Mess with your heads – A tricky combination of colours, swear words and pictures will confuse even your smartest of friends.
Make it your own – Your creations become the star of each game. Use the colour-popping scratch cards to create your own rules using words and pictures, then keep them for future games.
Choose your challenge – With a variety of extra challenge cards to add to the mix, no round will ever be the same.
Laugh at your friends – watch your friends fail while they decide to swear or not.


The long awaited follow up from the makers of F**k. The Game.
categories: Card Game, Humor, Mature / Adult, Party Game

name: Once Upon a Rainy Day
description:
The weather outside is gloomy - but inside, the cats are ready to have some fun. The mice have invited them to play hide and seek: find four mice to win the game. It’s not that simple though - those pesky mice just won’t keep still! Meanwhile, the dog is curious and wants to play... but wherever he goes, he is in the way.

Playing the game:
When it is your turn to move, spin the spinner and move your cat the number of spaces the arrow indicates. You are allowed to leave the center room in any direction but afterward, you must move your cat in a clockwise direction on the outer circle. Landing on a specific space will trigger some event, depending if there is a mouse on it or not.

Winning the game:
The winner is the first player who finds their four mice and then goes to the room where the dog is to impress him.

name: Gardo
description:
Gardo is a tile-laying game for 2 to 3 players where you aim to score the most points. Each player will take 3 actions on their turn, choosing from 2 possible actions: lay a tile or place a cube.

The cubes are in each players color and show a value corresponding to their influence - but the numbers are not known to your opponents until the game ends.

The tiles show various paths on them and completed loops at the end of the game will score for the players with the most influence in that area. Certain incomplete areas will also score.
mechanics: Action Points, Area Majority / Influence, Tile Placement
publishers: Board Game Production Committee (ボドゲ製作委員会)

name: Spy Alley: Card Game
description:
SECERT AGENT CARD GAME | From the CIA, MI6 and the KGB, spies have changed the course of history. The Spy Alley Card game is your ticket to the world of espionage. Outwit your opponents and show them you have mastered the skills it takes to be the next Secret Agent

YOUR MISSION | The goal of the Spy Alley Card Game is to conceal your identity and outwit your opponents. Collect your spy equipment/documents before your opponents reveal your hidden identity, all the while trying to unmask your opponents. Be careful! A small gesture, a slight hesitation, or slip of the tongue, are all easy ways for your friends and family to oust your country and knock you out of the game

name: Wiem lepiej: Piłka nożna
description: Wiem lepiej: Piłka nożna is an expansion for Polish version of Bezzerwizzer game. It contains 60 questions about football and one category tile.
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Party Game, Trivia

name: Estate
description:
Estate is a connection game using a hexagonal board. The board is divided into five concentric areas, each with a different value.

Each player allocates their income points to each area and places their pieces on the board, as if they were buying lots. The winner is the first player to connect two opposing sides with only their own pieces.

—description from the designer

name: Easter Quest
description:
Easter is finally here and the annual egg-hunt is a long-awaited favourite for both young and old. Sharpen your sight, be the fastest egg hunter and above all - loot the most candy. Let the adventures found in Easter Quest begin!

In Easter Quest, each turn begins by revealing a card that depict an egg that matches an egg token somewhere in the forest (on the game board). All eggs appear to look the same but they actually differ slightly. The faster you locate the right egg token, the more likely you are to reach it before anyone else.

The game comes with both a basic and an advanced variant.

In the basic variant (children's variant) you will also need luck with the roll the dice and choose smart paths to be successful.

In the advanced variant (family variant) you need to find the shortest path AND count the correct number of steps, before anyone else, to be successful. Do not forget that you can "warp" by leaving the game board at one end and enter it at the other side.

The first player to reach the egg gets to loot it by drawing a candy token from the bag. The player with most candy win (as in real life).

The perfect game to play during Easter, or on any other day of the year.
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Multiple Maps, Pattern Recognition, Real-Time, Speed Matching, Variable Set-up

name: Taco Cat Goat Cheese Pizza: Easter Edition
description:
Race against each other to SLAP a match between a card and spoken word!

Taco Cat Goat Cheese Pizza: Easter Edition is filled to the brim with hand-slapping mayhem! As in Snap and Dobble, each player places a card from their hand face up into a community pile while saying taco/cat/goat/cheese/pizza in player sequence. When the card matches the mantra — boom! — everyone slaps their hand on the deck, with the last one to slap picking up the cards. Whoever rids themselves of cards first wins!

For extra fun, special action cards – the bunny-eared gorilla, chick-costumed narwhal, and egg-collecting groundhog — force players to make certain gestures before racing to slap the deck.

—description from the publisher
categories: Action / Dexterity, Card Game, Humor, Party Game, Real-time

name: LUPIN
description:
LUPIN is a team based trick-taking game. Players become characters in Maurice Leblanc's novel and compete for jewels. The gentleman thief Lupin and his lover Raymonde must steal as many jewels as possible. The genius boy Beautrelet, investigator Ganimard and detective Holmes must guard the jewels. As the game progress, you will naturally learn to think like them.

A round is divided into 1. Preparation 2. Planning 3. Crime 4. Scoring.


Preparation: Deal role cards and jewel cards.
Planning: Lupin makes plans to win as many jewel cards as possible.
Crime: Each team competes to win jewel cards based on trick-taking.
Scoring: Score based on whether the crime was successful or not.


The game is played for several rounds until a player scores over 813.
A round is a team match, but the team changes every round, so the game is individual.

—description from the designer

name: Perfil Express: Filmes e Séries
description:
Perfil Express Filmes e Séries brings a new way to play the classic 20 Questions game with categories inspired by streaming and movie screens!

The Game comes with 100 themed cards with movies and TV shows, each card has 10 tips worth up to 10 points. The first tip is less revealing, and the following ones progressively increase the chances of success.

This version was specially designed to be played by two people or two teams, without the need for a board.

With a new scoring system on a marker, the winner will be the one who scores the most points during five rounds, that is, after five cards have or have not guessed their identities.

name: Color Flip
description:
In Color Flip 2-4 players compete in a quick run against each other. The game works very similar to classic Pachisi, but in this version the pawns are separated into 3 parts and might mix-n-match with the parts from other players, which creates a fun mess. When combined with different colors, every players controls every piece of the combination in order to get to their personal goal area.

—description from the designer
categories: Children's Game, Collectible Components, Humor, Travel

name: Apart
description:
Apart is a game in which the goal is to distribute your pieces, as opposed to a game in which you create groups.

Initially, each player's pieces are grouped together, and players try to move them efficiently so that none of their pieces are vertically, horizontally, or diagonally adjacent to each other.

The distance a piece moves is determined by the length of the line to which it is joined.

This game can be played with Generic Board "Square".

name: Trap Construction Corp
description:
A local dungeon keeper has hired you and your company to construct some traps for their newly purchased dungeon. You have 8 days, thus 8 traps, to fulfill their request. Beware, however, as this client can be a bit picky. They only know what trap they want the day of so there's not a lot of ability to plan ahead! They may even want some "personal space" installed! Best of luck!

Roll a die and create traps to hopefully cover the whole board in eight turns. Try your best to leave no white spaces left, because if you fail, points will be deducted from your total score.

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Paper-and-Pencil, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: にくの細道 マッチョ芭蕉筋肉紀行 The Narrow Road to the muscle
description:
You are a young man of the bone tribe who is usually laughed at as a poor muscle boy.
But a book you meet one day will change your life. The book is called “The Narrow Road to the muscle.”
It is a book about the process by which the legendary haiku master “Macho Basho” travelled around the country composing haiku and writing them.

After reading this book, you set out on a journey to get a perfect body by visiting gyms all over the country while composing haiku.

Players aim to collect the muscle parts while a journy. Collecting more muscle parts gives you higher MP(VP), and you also get higher MP(VP) if you reach to the goal faster than the other players. Player who got the highest MP(VP) is win and also get the perfect body!

—description from the designer
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Open Drafting, Race, Set Collection

name: Minikartengolf
description:
Who will manage to sink the golf ball in the fewest moves?
Each card in the 7×7 grid shows either a number from 1 to 5 or wild in each direction (orthogonal and diagonal), which is the distance you can hit your ball. Starting at the golf ball card, try to make it to each hole (flag numbered 1-18) in less moves than your opponents.

name: Omicron Protocol: Critical Condition – Xi
description:
Xi (“Iguana” in Chinese), is a much-loved pet of Lady Rose, the leader of the Red Dragons triad. Her fearsome cyber-jaw (filled with nano-venom) and powerful tail will easily incapacitate all enemies. She is a valuable addition to both the Red Dragons and Animals factions in the fight to survive San Lazaro!

—description from the publisher
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Miniatures, Science Fiction
mechanics: Action Points, Area Movement, Campaign / Battle Card Driven, Dice Rolling

name: Find Finley
description:
Meet Finley, a master of deception. You look left, Finley runs right. You look right, Finley's... well... we don't know.

Finley's escaped again, and you're assigned to investigate. Study the intelligence reports and the expansive full-color map to determine which building Finley is hiding in.

But here's the catch: you don't have all of the intelligence yet. It's a race between players to strategically swap intelligence cards and get the information needed to find Finley first!

Start the game by selecting a challenge card. Each challenge card has 12 affiliated intelligence cards, which are distributed evenly amongst players.

Review your intelligence cards, take notes on your Investigator's Notepad, and strategically swap cards with another player on your turn. Each card has a different piece of information that you can use to build a picture of Finley's movements--once you think you have enough data, you can guess Finley's location. The first player to correctly guess Finley's location on the map wins!

-description from publisher
mechanics: Deduction, Dice Rolling, Lose a Turn, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game, Trading
publishers: Copag Cards, Fat Brain Toy Company, Lúdilo

name: Munchkin Side Quests 2
description:
Didn't get enough glory the first time around?
Maybe you're ready for Munchkin Side Quests 2!

Even more difficult but oh-so-tempting goals and goodies to add to any Munchkin game – will you go straight for the win at Level 10, or will the extra rewards tickle your inner munchkin?

-description from publisher's website

name: Zoorena
description:
Welcome to Zoorena, the intergalactic Battle Arena where some of the galaxy's fiercest Zoo Keepers pit their finest combatants against each other to emerge as the new Champion! Zoorena is a fun-filled fast-paced family game that is perfect for short bursts of fun on the go! (description on box)

Zoorena is a card game in which there are 10 types of combatants, numbered 1 to 10, each having a unique power. You always have a hand size of exactly 1. On your turn you have the option to initiate a fight. The winner claims the loser's card as a trophy which is worth points. You can invite others to gang up on one opponent. If you win, the weakest ally wins the trophy. The game ends if any player owns 5 trophies, or when the deck runs out.

—description from the publisher

name: Golden Train
description:
In the Wild West, railroad companies are locked in a tough battle to have the longest train. The competition is fierce and you'll need the smartest strategies to attack the carriages without getting caught by the sheriffs.
In this fast-moving game, each player is trying to come out on top to conquer the West.

—description from the publisher

name: Yubi Sugoroku
description:
Yubi Sugoroku is a "roll and move" adjacent game where players are racing along a path. Each player starts with one hand out, and 5 fingers extended. On their turn, they choose how many fingers to fold down, and that is how far they can move.

The path has been randomized and starts face down. Each space of the path shows a drawing of a fist extending 0 to 5 fingers. When you land on a space, you gain back the number of fingers shown and reveal all spaces up to that point.

However, if you land on a space while your fist shows 0 fingers (rock) or 2 fingers (scissors), you play rock-paper-scissors against the space you land on (if applicable). If you win, take another turn immediately; if you lose, you lose your next turn. If there is a tie, you resolve as normal.

After the first round, remove the tiles showing 3 fingers and play another round. Then, remove the tiles showing 1 finger and play another round.

The person with the most points after three rounds wins.

name: Dog Man: Flip-o-Rama
description: Players stack Flip-o-Rama Cards in the middle of the play area and take turns flipping them over. The first player to spot a Flip-o-Rama match dings the Bell. The player to collect the most Flip-o-Rama Cards wins!

name: らくらく冒険者の幸せ異世界ライフ (Rakuraku Boukensha no Shiawase Isekai Life)
description:
Being reincarnated into another world with OP abilities and fighting monsters is a cliche, in this game your goal is to have the best time with your partner.

Each game lasts 12 rounds, divided into 4 seasons. One round is one month. In each round you either choose a task from a variety that guild offers or build your base. Once per season there is also a special seasonal event.

Winner is the player who after 12 rounds has the most victory points.

name: Badland Rivals
description:
A 2-3 player push-your-luck adventure card game set in a hostile, post-apocalyptic badland. Players are simultaneously rivals and reluctant allies.

Players reveal Encounters, reading them out loud and choosing how to overcome them. Once a path is chosen, all players participate together, drawing from the Resource deck in an attempt to gather the most cards into their Packs, and finding useful equipment and collections along the way.Victory Points are awarded for the quantity of Resource cards, with extra points awarded from special cards collected and equipped, and a bonus unique to each Character.

name: Gli Eroi della Mitologia
description:
Gli Eroi della Mitologia is a free Print & Play Italian game for 2, 3 or 4 players set in the Heroic Age of Greek Mythology and allows players to assume the role of the Gods of Olympus trying to control the destinies of their Heroes on Earth. Each player has a certain number of points which he must use to try to control the heroes who have objectives to achieve based on the cards drawn. If they succeed, they score victory points.

—description from the designer

name: Rulebenders: Game Brewer Theme Expansion
description: Add a whole new theme to your Rulebenders game. You'll travel through all of Game Brewer's games, past and future. Game includes 35 theme cards, one miniature, one plastic game token, and one storage box.

name: Mozkovna: Společenská hra
description:
Mozkovna: Společenská hra (Brainworks: The Board Game) is a fast-paced trivia game that exercises all parts of the brain in 5 categories.

The challenges that must be completed within a given time limit are divided into logic, graphic, text, knowledge, as well as those for perception and memory. In the game, it is possible to bet on your opponents - on their success or failure - to gain additional valuable points.
The goal of the game is simple - to score as many points as possible by correctly solving the puzzles and properly betting on your opponents.

name: Bahnbau Spiel B63
description:
The B63 is a construction division of the Wiener Linien, the Vienniese public transport systems, responsible for maintaining and repairing the infrastructure of Viennas public transport. A worker had the idea tomcreate a board game to honor the often overlooked but vitally important work of this division.

Management really liked this idea, but the game she created was not yet a polished product. So they gave the job to Arno Steinwender and Ronald Hofstätter, who were already experienced as a design Team and they created a quick and fun game with tactical and memory elements under the White Castle games umbrella.

The game was given to workers in the B63 division as a christmas gift, and could be bought at ticket counters in Vienna for a limited time.

name: Office War
description:
Office War is a fast-paced card game that lets you take out your aggressions without losing your day job. Players attempt to get each other's employees "fired" in a war of staplers, spitballs and wet mops. Stay low, and whatever you do... Don't Get Caught! The last player to retain control over any employees is the winner.

You will need to manage the amount of attention your employees gather in the office war. Attention counters are small paperclips, and the game comes with a package of colorful paperclips.

To win, arm your employees with office weapons and play action cards that influence the office war. Office weapons include items like rulers, tacks, coffee creamers, and even "The Bark of Authority" (usable only by Executives). Action cards are modifiers. They include events like "Lunch with the Boss," "Reorganization," "Promotion" and "No Toilet Paper."

Using an office weapon comes with its own risk and reward. For example, if a Maintenance employee uses their wet mop, they will dish out three attention counters to their target, but take three counters themselves. Whenever an employee receives attention counters, the employee's controller must roll two dice. If the dice roll is equal to or less than their number of attention counters, the employee is fired and escorted to the discard pile.

Each turn a player draws a card, may play an action card, equip a weapon, engage in employee v. employee office warfare, then redraws cards to the hand size. Play passes until only one player remains, because as everyone knows, office wars are ruthless.

—user summary
categories: Card Game, Fighting, Humor, Territory Building
mechanics: Dice Rolling, King of the Hill, Player Elimination, Take That, Turn Order: Pass Order

name: You are the President
description:
Should teenagers be given the vote? Should dangerous science be banned? Should fun jobs get lower salaries? You are the President. You decide in this social board game that will have you debating hot topics with your friends and family.

The President has been assassinated and you, the Senators, must vote on the issues facing your fictional state - while keeping one eye on the presidency, of course! Wrestle with political dilemmas of the past, present, and future and navigate the election without damaging your image. As you get closer to the top spot, find out how well you really know your friends and discover who has what it takes to lead the country.

The goal is to become the next popular president by gaining 125 popularity points. You move on the game board by rolling a die, and can land on different events that affects popularity. You draw different question cards which all players have to take a stance and vote on one of three answers, or come up with a better idea that all players may also vote on. When there's a tie, you'll have to debate and convince other players to change their vote.

name: Foosball Winner
description: 2-player game of action and speed where the goal is to pass all of your pucks into the opposing player's side of the sectioned board. But the action must be done using one hand only and using the elastic band to propel your pucks through the opening to the other side.

name: Monkey Mayhem
description:
Monkey Mayhem is the wild and wacky card game. In this game, you will draw cards and use their special effects to manipulate the game in your favor. Steal bananas, swap hands, and unleash Monkey Mayhem on your opponents! But be careful, as they'll be doing the same to you!

To win, you need to collect as many as point cards possible. If one of the player's hand or the deck is out, the game over. In your turn, you must draw and play a card as point, then play an action card (optional).

—description from the designer

name: Doo Doo Kangaroo
description:
Doo Doo Kangaroo is a game of silly fun and action where kids feed the kooky kangaroo donuts until he does doo-doos! Then it becomes a game of fast skill and observation as they quickly try to grab the donuts but dodge the doo-doo! This fun party game is sure to make kids giggle as soon as they see Doo Doo Kangaroo sitting on his toilet waiting to be fed! Players take turns by spinning the spinner to see how many donuts to feed the kangaroo. When Doo Doo Kangaroo is full... Watch out, he's gotta go! He'll start to shake and shimmy all around the table causing donuts or doo-doos to fall out of his toilet! Race to pick up the donuts and place them on your plate but don't pick up the doo-doo! The first player with 5 donuts on their plate wins!

—description from publisher

name: On Your Marks
description:
How well do you know your logos!? This amazing game of quick brand recognition, which is fast and frantic, is the ideal game for the whole family to join in with — but do you know your Chupa Chups from your Cornetto, Colgate from your Aquafresh? A simple game to play — each player must collect brands that match the mission cards being read out. Collect the most brands to win!

Logo cards are spread across the table between players and each player has a section cup stick to collect logos. There is a deck of cards which give you a criteria for each round (e.g. laundry brands or logos with green in them) then it’s a mad dash between players to grab the correct logos.

name: Drawn Hungry
description:
A culinary card game that feels like you’re competing on your favorite cooking show - without destroying the kitchen.

Grab your starting hand - Every player starts the game by grabbing five ingredient cards and five dish cards for their own hand, along with a piece of paper and a pencil.

Pick the Head Chef - One player takes a turn as the Head Chef each round. The Head Chef starts the round by picking a card from the Special Occasion Deck and a card from the Ingredient deck (which is now the secret ingredient).

5 minutes to create a dish - All the players now have 5 minutes to write down a unique recipe for a dish that utilizes the cards in their hand and the secret ingredient, something they would bring to that round’s special occasion.

Present and judge - Once the five minutes are up, all the players take turns presenting their recipes to the head chef. The head chef picks one person to win, and that winner accumulates points for the ingredient and dish cards they used in their recipe.

Repeat - Players continue playing rounds by redrawing cards and taking turns as the Head Chef. First player to reach 25 points wins!

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Hand Management, Paper-and-Pencil, Player Judge, Storytelling
publishers: Jordan Gayle Johnson Digital Media, LLC

name: 9-Card Rally Run
description:
Drive through all 9 road cards and cross the finish line with the best possible score.
Roll 3 dice to determine your movements and make strategic choices to optimize your speed and safety.

SUMMARY

Game is played in turns until you go through all 9 roads.
In each turn you will roll 3 dice and must place a number of dice equal to your current gear.
The rest may be used now or reserved for the next turn without being rolled again (max. 1).
You have the option to reroll up to twice. However, after each roll, including the initial roll, at least one die must be utilized.
Then, once there are no more dice to roll, move your car. The placement of your dice dictates the car’s trajectory on the road.
Each road card will have 2 to 3 lanes; Left (L), Middle (M), and Right (R) with each lane consisting of up to 4 spaces.
Each lane has a dice requirement: L (1-2), M (3-4), and R (5-6).
End your turn by drawing a new road card to replace a road you passed. If there are no more roads, you win the game.

name: BIG 1: Pack O Game Micro Expansion
description: This deck of 30 cards adds new and extended gameplay for each of the titles in Pack O Game SET 1. 1-6 cards enhance: HUE, TKO, GEM, FLY, TAJ, LIE, SHH and BUS.
categories: Abstract Strategy, Action / Dexterity, Deduction, Expansion for Base-game, Transportation
mechanics: Action/Event, Betting and Bluffing, Hand Management, Pattern Building, Pick-up and Deliver, Rock-Paper-Scissors, Tile Placement

name: Chronicles of Drunagor: Age of Darkness – Attendant
description:
GenCon Exclusive Gift from Creative Games Studio.
This new Attendant role replaces the Support role.

name: Phase 10 Junior Card Game
description: Build simple combinations of cards (different animals, numbers, and colours) to complete each phase.

name: The Balance
description:
Part of the Gravity Games "Balance" series from 2013, consisting of two of their titles in one box: Hungry Higgs and Gravity Gammon.

Hungry Higgs is played with two dice with sides 1, 2 and 3, and pieces on a balancing board. Every one of the play pieces has got a certain weight that can have decisive influence on the game. The main strategy is to balance between caution (don’t be knocked out by your opponents game piece) and greed (capture as much prey as possible).

Gravity Gammon is a backgammon-like gravity game. The board has a few shortcuts. You can win either by getting your pieces home first, or by your opponent tilting the board.

name: Keep it as a Memory
description:
You sit at the table by the window. Looking out to the mountains outside. Reminisce about the past that is now just a memory.
There are some memories that you want to call back.
with that feeling , The journey through memories to collect the crystals of feeling happen.
The first Players who can travel, collect crystals of feeling and recall all the target memory will win

name: Picablo
description:
The Drawing Game Where ANYONE Can Be An Artist! No art skills required!

Discover a world of artistic fun with Picablo, an inclusive drawing game for everyone! Whether you're a professional artist or you've barely doodled, Picablo ensures everyone can join in the excitement.

Inspired by a unique shape die, players create imaginative drawings based on prompt cards. The game caters to diverse play styles, offering both competitive and cooperative game modes. Draw, guess, and party on with endless combinations and endless laughter.

Each game is a new creative journey, no two alike, offering tremendous replayability. Picablo is more than just a game - it's an innovative way to unlock your creativity, engage with friends and family, and create unforgettable memories. Add Picablo to your collection today for an exceptional drawing game experience!

name: Cthulhu Wars: Nine to Eleven Player Earth Map
description: Some might question the sanity of anyone who desires to play a game of Cthulhu Wars with this many players. Even the publisher says anyone who wants to do this needs a lobotomy. Includes a large neoprene mat with an enlarged map of Earth officially for 9-11 players. The Ritual of Annihilation track, however, has a track for up to 12 players!
mechanics: Action Points, Area Movement, Dice Rolling, Variable Player Powers

name: Magic: The Gathering – Wilds of Eldraine
description:
This booster expansion for Magic: The Gathering revisits the fairy-tale world of Eldraine (previously featured in Throne of Eldraine) in the aftermath of the New Phyrexian invasion, which devastated the five knightly courts and forced most of the human denizens of the plane to retreat to the wilds, where all manner of fairy-tale dangers await. To make matters worse, the Wicked Slumber spell that the defenders of Eldraine used to repel the Phyrexians didn't end when the invaders were routed, and it continues to spread. Meanwhile, Will and Rowan Kenrith, the heirs to the throne, are at odds with each other over how to repair the realm, and a young hero named Kellan is taking his first steps on an epic journey...

Wilds of Eldraine is sold in draft boosters, set boosters, collector boosters, and bundles. Two preconstructed commander decks, "Fae Dominion" and "Virtue and Valor", were also released alongside the main set. The set features the return of the popular Adventure mechanic from Throne of Eldraine, alongside the new mechanics of Role Tokens, Bargain, and Celebration.

—user summary
categories: Card Game, Collectible Components, Fantasy, Fighting
mechanics: Closed Drafting, Deck Construction, Hand Management, Income, Interrupts, Take That

name: Stadt Land Vollpfosten: Das Kartenspiel – Christmas Edition
description:
Gameplay

Each player is randomly given 8 letter cards. Now each player must place a word matching one of his letter cards as quickly as possible. Important: The first letter of the word counts and you do NOT have to form a term from the letter cards, as is sometimes the case in other games, e.g. Scrabble.

So it gets exciting: The 60 category cards contain a total of 200 different and funny categories:

Who can put down a "profession" first? Or a "reason for separation"? What about a "city abroad"? Can you quickly think of a "Famous Dead Person" or a "Famous Actor" for your letter cards?

Important now: The FASTEST player wins each round and at the end the player who first got rid of all letter cards wins the game. The 10 additional action cards make the game especially exciting.

Of course, there are also FULL FIX cards in the game that either act as jokers or are used as tricky counters.

Das offizielle Kartenspiel von STADT LAND VOLLPFOSTEN mit 120 Spielkarten für ein unvergessliches Spielerlebnis unter Freunden.
150 kreative und lustige Kategorien bringen jeden Hobbydenker ins Schwitzen. Spaß Garantiert!

Spielablauf:

Jeder Spieler bekommt per Zufallsprinzip 8 Buchstaben-Karten ausgehändigt. Nun muss jeder Spieler möglichst schnell einen Begriff passend zu einer seiner Buchstaben-Karten ablegen. Wichtig: Es zählt jeweils der Anfangsbuchstabe des Wortes und man muss NICHT aus den Buchstaben-Karten einen Begriff bilden, wie es in anderen Spielen z.B: Scrabble manchmal der Fall ist.

Es wird also spannend: Die 60 Kategorie-Karten enthalten insgesamt 200 verschiedene und lustige Kategorien:

Wer kann zuerst einen “Beruf” ablegen? Oder einen “Trennungsgrund”? Was ist mit einer “Stadt im Ausland”? Fällt dir zu deinen Buchstaben-Karten schnell ein “Berühmter Toter” ein bzw. kommt Dir sofort ein “bekannter Schauspieler” in den Sinn?

Wichtig nun: Der SCHNELLSTE Spieler gewinnt jeweils die Runde und am Ende gewinnt der Spieler das Spiel, der zuerst alle Buchstaben-Karten losgeworden ist. Durch die 10 zusätzlichen Aktionskarten wird das Spiel besonders spannend.

Natürlich gibt es auch VOLLPFOSTEN-Karten im Spiel die entweder als Joker wirken oder als kniffliger Konter genutzt werden.

The official card game of STADT LAND VOLLPFOSTEN with 120 playing cards for an unforgettable gaming experience among friends.
150 creative and fun categories will make any amateur thinker sweat. Fun guaranteed!
categories: Action / Dexterity, Card Game, Party Game

name: Battle of Britain
description: The Battle of Britain is a mini-game about the World War II air campaign over Britain in 1940. The game took part in "Postcards from the Front Wargame Design Jam" on itch.io and was a free download for backers of the "Halls of Hegra" Kickstarter campaign. It is for 1-2 players, and does include a solitaire variant. The game can be played in 5-10 minutes. Components include a 5" x 7" postcard with the game board on the front and the rules on the back. There are six counters attached to the postcard that require cutting or copying and mounting. A deck of regular playing cards are also needed for game play.
categories: Aviation / Flight, Wargame, World War II

name: ハイエナ勇者はサボリたい (Hyena Hero Wants to Slack Off)
description:
You are "hyena heroes" who fight in packs Their usual style is to work together to defeat monsters. But everyone thinks "I just want to be able to slack off somehow..."

All players work together to defeat enemy monsters that attack one after another. Each monster has a damage value. Players simultaneously choose an attack card from their hand. When revealed, if everyone's attacks add up to the monster's value, they win. If they fall short of the monster's damage value, they have failed that battle.

When a monster is defeated, it's the player who slacks off the most (plays the lowest value attack card) that gets points. However, if everyone slacks off too much and cannot defeat the enemy, the person who slacks off the most will receive a penalty instead! So choose wisely!
mechanics: Betting and Bluffing, Cooperative Game, Hand Management, Push Your Luck

name: Dracula's Curse
description:
Prepare to become a legendary Slayer in the ever-shifting depths of Dracula's Curse. This procedurally generated dungeon crawler plunges you and your fellow Slayers into a nightmarish realm, where no two playthroughs are ever the same. Choose from one of 7 Slayers each with their own unique abilities, backgrounds, and subclasses or embrace the darkness and play as Dracula himself, the ultimate lord of the night.

One among you will embrace the dark side as Dracula, with the power to summon minions, reap souls, set traps, and manipulate the castle itself. As Slayers, you must strategically work together, gathering items, enhancing your skills, and uncovering the castle's secrets. Yet, be wary — friendships can swiftly turn as fallen Slayers have the chance to join Dracula's legion, working against their former allies.

With stunning, handcrafted (AI free) artwork from talented artists around the world and game play that balances strategy, deception, and teamwork, Dracula's Curse promises not just a game night but an unforgettable journey into the macabre.

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Hidden Roles, Map Addition, Modular Board, Role Playing

name: Satori: Essen Spiel 2023 Promo
description:
A small punchboard with 2 meditation tiles for the game Satori, given away to buyers @ Spiel'23 Essen. It also contains a small Spiel logo to recognize them.

The tiles themselves are used in the mountain region on the map, the are mixed up in the 2 draw piles (era 1&2) with the other tiles.

The exact rules for them can be found here in the files section.

name: Five Peaks: Campfire Promo Cards
description:
Five promo cards to add to the campfire deck.

Make more baskets, jars or pouches. Find more cards with endgame victory points.
categories: Card Game, Economic, Environmental, Expansion for Base-game, Racing, Travel
mechanics: Action Retrieval, Command Cards, Deck Construction, Modular Board

name: Spin The Dare
description:
Place a Dare Card on the spinner and give it a good flick. If it lands on you, you can do the dare for a point...or you can take a drink. Whoever has the most points by the end wins!

Includes: 250 Dare Cards, Spinner, Instructions

name: Cartzzle: Labyrinthe champs dessus dessous
description:
Cartzzle is a new concept of board game containing a game, a work of art and puzzles. Compose this graphic interpretation of Stephane Escapa, then redo it by taking up challenges.

The box holds a single Cartzzle, an endless one you can make with both sides of the 50 cards. Cartzzles are pictures you must first piece together by laying cards on top of each other (with or without the template, depending on your dedication). Then, start again, using challenges this time! Removing cards, flipping them, and laying them elsewhere will change the picture and also allow you to meet some challenges (as example: Help the daddy to find is puppets).

name: FDMNA
description:
Players compete to reach the other side of the board before their opponent.

On your turn, you must come up with a word that starts with a letter shown on an adjacent space on the board. The catch is, your word has to relate to the last word your opponent said.

name: RooTile
description:
RooTile is a board game for 2-4 players with a solo 1-player mode where you connect flowers to water using root tiles.

Players place root tiles to try to connect their Flower tile at the top of the board with the water at the bottom of the board. Action tokens can be used to move or rotate root tiles after they are placed, sometimes producing a sudden win. Tiles are distributed randomly at the beginning of the game and are hidden from the other players.

name: Pop Off!
description:
Battle your friends in fast-paced, goofy challenges that are just as fun to lose as they are to win! Specially designed Pop Cups will launch your balls at high speed as you knock over cup towers, play chaotic games of catch, and compete to become the Top Popper!

Anyone can win this game of high-flying fun so grab your friends and prepare to Pop Off!

name: AdventureX: Jurassic World
description:
As part of the Department of Fish and Wildlife, you and your team members work to track down dinosaurs around the globe and transport them to Biosyn Sanctuary where they can live freely. You pilot a cargo plane that can carry dinosaurs as large as a T.rex. Your Mission today is to deliver three rare dinosaur eggs to Biosyn Valley in the Dolomite Mountains. You look at the portable incubator in the seat next to you. These eggs must be pretty special...

Begin Your Adventure - AdventureX is a collaborative dinosaur-themed board game that has an unfolding 3D game board!

Puzzles - Follow clues and solve puzzles to unfold the layers of the game as you journey to get your dinosaur eggs to safety.

Collaborative Play - Share information and work together! You can refer to the hint card and use the red filter on the Satellite Radio to reveal hints.

—description from publisher
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Deduction, Paper-and-Pencil, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: Chop Stacks
description:
Chop Stacks, the fun and easy-to-play chopstick game! The game is simple to understand, but impossible to master. The game box is small and fits in your pocket, purse, or backpack, making it easy to carry with you. Inside the box, you'll find a table base and a table top, along with a set of chopsticks. To play the game, players take a piece and then place it on the table. If a player drops a piece, they must keep it. And if a player has five pieces, they're out of the game. It's perfect for anyone who wants to get better at using chopsticks in a fun way or to show off their skills. The game can be played solo, with two players, or in a group. So grab your chopsticks and let the games begin!

—description from the designer

name: Würfelfisch
description:
Who will be the quickest to find the right sea creature with all their dice?

At the beginning, each player has a dice cup and three dice. All the dice have the same motifs printed on them: dice fish, starfish, crab, seahorse, octopus and a submarine. Each player places their three dice in front of them so that the submarine is facing upwards. Another die is now rolled and placed in the middle of the table. This one shows a starfish, for example. Now all the players call out together "3...2...1... Dive!" and the action starts.
The first thing each player tries to do is to roll the three dice to get the animal from the centre of the table, but only one dice may be in the cup at a time. So the dice are rolled one by one! Once someone has hit the animal they are looking for with all of their dice, they shout out loud "Show up!" and everyone finishes their roll. The calling player then gets the die from the centre of the table and adds it to his own. If a player still has submarines in front of him, he must give up one cube. The first player to have five or six dice wins.

The dice game for children and families "Würfelfisch" is suitable for 2-5 players aged 5 and up. It takes about 15 minutes and is by the author Christoph Cantzler.

—description from the publisher (translated)

name: Batman: Gotham City Sem Lei
description:
Become a supervillain in Batman: Gotham City Sem Lei!

Dominate the districts of Gotham City, recruit the most experienced villains to increase your influence. Outsmart your opponents by climbing the ranks of the underworld.
Beware, Arkham Asylum awaits those who fail. Reach 10 influence points and become Batman's greatest enemy!

In this game, clearly inspired by Pit, players trade simultaneously trying to get a set of five villains of the same type to control one of the districts.

The last player gets no district and loses influence.
However, players who manage to get their hands on a set, in addition to influence, will also be able to realize their super-villain's special power.

After that, all cards are shuffled again and we start a new round. The player who achieves 10 influence wins the game.

name: Ancient Knowledge: Heritage
description:
The Ancient Knowledge: Heritage expansion consists of two elements:


16 solo mode cards that allow you to play a campaign. You choose 1-5 objectives, placing them in the artifact slots on the player board (and thereby denying you the potential use of artifacts!), and whichever objectives you complete become powers that you can employ in future games.



36 new builder cards and 12 new technology cards that you can shuffle into the decks, making them 25% larger.
categories: Ancient, Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Mythology
mechanics: Command Cards, End Game Bonuses, Hand Management, Open Drafting

name: Assassin's Creed: Vendetta
description:
In Assassin’s Creed: Vendetta, you will play as an Assassin or a Templar and try to unmask your adversaries and strike at the right time during an evening.

Since the dawn of time, the Brotherhood of Assassins and the Order of the Templars have waged a merciless war to impose their vision for the future of Humanity.

With the killer game Assassin’s Creed: Vendetta, relive this centuries-old confrontation as an Assassin or a Templar and do everything possible to eliminate the members of the opposing faction.
You will have to show cunning, mischief and use stratagems to fulfill the elimination conditions and thus achieve victory.

Kill your enemies discreetly, or act in the middle of a crowd...

name: Iron Made
description:
Become the Industrial Tycoon who dominates the production chains in this strategy roll and write print and play board game. You create production chain which goal is to create steel.

Use your dice to create a terrain in two of four colors, which give you resources when they connect with other terrains of the same colors, then build necessary structures. Those structures must be connected to operate.

Players deliver ores from mines to steelworks, then prepared steel from steelworks to factories, and finally, store finished goods in warehouses. Player who creates the most functional chains becomes the winner.

—description from the designer
mechanics: Chaining, Dice Rolling, Drawing, Tile Placement

name: Desert War: Area 88
description:
Desert War: Area 88 is a Japanese doujin (fan-made) game that was produced for sale only at game shows in Japan, such as Tokyo Game Market. To get one you would place an order in advance, the game would be made and brought to the show for you to pick up. It was not for sale to the general public.

This game is based on the anime series Area 88, and deals with mercenary fight pilots fighting for a fictitious kingdom called Aslan.

This particular title uses the "Commando" system from Decision Games. It is a solitaire game where you are trying to earn enough money to end your contract with the Asland Defense Forces and return back to Japan. Each mission you complete brings you closer to your goal.

Game comes with rules, map, event sheet, and counters. Assembly is required.

—user summary
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Hexagon Grid, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: Монстр-трюк (Monster Stunt)
description: Players hire monsters as riders, buy special stunt cars/motorcycles/trucks and learn how to execute the most spectacular performances (using meeple placement). After that they visit different cities to show tricks to the public and gain fame (using dice and push-your-luck mechanism). The goal of the game is to be the first player who successfully performs certain amounts of shows (depends on player count).

name: Het Tokkenspel
description:
Tokkenspel, the board game with many more options, provides sufficient tension every time. What about the black dot to 'jump over', the use of jokers or the five with which you can put the opponent past the home base. A new game with a new board that will give young and old fun for years to come!

THE OBJECTIVE OF THE GAME
You play Het Tokkenspel in teams of 2 people. The goal is to be the first team to get all your pawns into the home box (the row with 4 colored dots).

PREPARATION
Het Tokkenspel is placed in the center of the table and the pawns are put in place (the colored boxes on the outside of the board).
With 4 people you play with 1 deck of cards (52 pieces) and 2 jokers.
With 6 people you play with 1 ½ decks of cards (78 pieces) and 3 jokers. To do this, take all red or black cards and 1 joker from the extra deck. You decide in advance who starts dealing the cards. The player next to the dealer (clockwise) starts.

COURSE OF THE GAME
You play Tokkenspel with 4 or 6 people (in teams of 2 people).
The order is divided into three rounds

1st round 5 cards
2nd round 4 cards
3rd round 4 cards.


2 (4-person) or 3 cards (6-person) remain. If a joker is played, that player receives one of the extra cards. If the joker cannot be played, the card will not come in play.

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Race, Static Capture, Take That, Team-Based Game

name: Pacific Command
description:
Between December 1941 to August 1945, a sea war was fought in the Pacific unlike any before, as the long-range striking power of aircraft carriers ended the 250-year reign supremacy of the battleship.

Pacific Command is a tabletop wargame of WWII naval combat in the Pacific which puts you in control of dozens of warships and hundreds of aircraft; fighting battles as much about bluffing and surprise as strength of arms. The game has a particular focus on fog of war and aircraft carrier logistics, and zooms out to a grand scale to let players tell stories as full of dilemmas, uncertainties and double-blind gambits as the battles of Coral Sea, Midway and Leyte Gulf.

—description from the publisher
categories: Aviation / Flight, Bluffing, Miniatures, Nautical, Wargame, World War II
mechanics: Betting and Bluffing, Force Commitment, Hidden Movement, Measurement Movement, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game, Secret Unit Deployment, Simulation

name: Pola Magnetic Games System
description:
Pola Magnetic Game is a brand new 3D Magnetic Games System! It is a whole constellation of games coming to you. Play in countless ways with this amazing system or even design your own games! Explore two ways to play we have ready with more to come. The Pola Magnetic Games System is your playground!

Pola can be played anywhere thanks to its magnetic components. It doesn't require 20 minutes of setup or special boards! Just grab a friend and start playing, on a couch, in a park, on a beach, or even in space!

Pola was created in collaboration with people with visual impairments to make our game fully accessible for them as well!

name: Patachof
description:
Welcome to the championship of.... potatoes?!

Train your jumping potatoes and form your team for the annual competition. To do this, you will have to use your cards well and try to get the best ones. Of course, the competition with other trainers will be fierce.

The game is played in two stages:

The first one is an auction to win the most valuable potatos , each of them with one of five different jump styles that will be realized in the second stage of the game. To win an auction players will play a number card (numbers go from 1 to 6) or a combination of cards. The highest value will choose first from the current market of potatoes. After eight rounds of bidding players will end with a team of elite trained or noobs potato-jumpers. Also, be carefull of not spend so many auction cards or you will end with less potatoes than the rest of players.

The second stage is an actual ability contest, where players will try to throw their potatoes and land in the pool... I mean box, according to the jumping style of each one. The potatoes that will land in the box will value points according to their level (from legends, which worth 4 points, to noobs, which only worth 1 point).

Finally, when all the potatoes have jumped to the pool, regardles they miss or land it, players will count how many points have win. The player with the highest puntuation wins.

Will you get your team to win the competition? A fun game of potato throwing and high jumping!
categories: Action / Dexterity, Card Game, Humor, Sports
mechanics: Auction: Sealed Bid, Flicking, Set Collection, Simultaneous Action Selection

name: STAKD
description:
Experience the thrill of creative competition with this unique board game, where players strategically stack premium game pieces to craft a stunning, ever-changing topographical mountain right on your table. Each game is a work of art, as players aim to be the last one to expertly lay their game piece. This dynamic and visually captivating game promises endless fun and surprises as you build your way to victory.

Stakd is a strategic stacking game played in rounds. Each round, players stack pieces to build the game (or block their opponents) until no more pieces can be added. The last person to lay a tile wins the round. The first player to win 3 rounds wins the game. But be careful! If you can't lay a tile, you're out for the round!

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Player Elimination, Stacking and Balancing, Take That

name: Orchard: Recipes
description: These 14 cards feature Recipe Challenges that provide a win/lose condition (as an alternative to ‘beat your own score’) for Orchard: 9 card solitaire game - adding a new way to play the award winning game of fruit harvesting.

name: L'Esmolet
description:
L'Esmolet will be in charge of sharpening the tools of the characters that we will have strategically saved until the end.

We will be playing action cards and stealing. In addition to keeping the pairs of cards of traditional professions until the Esmolet comes out, when it appears the money collected during the game will be counted and whoever has the most wins.

—description from the designer (translated)

L’esmolet serà l’encarregat d’afilar les eines dels personatges que haurem guardat estratègicament fins al final.
Anirem jugant cartes d'acció i robant. A més de guardar les parelles de cartes de professions tradicionals fins que surti l'Esmolet, quan aparegui es farà recompte dels diners recaptats durant la partida i qui tingui més guanya.

—description from the designer

name: Marathon
description:
A 2 person card game where players race to win the title of Marathon, the fastest messenger in Greece.

Marathon is a quick hand-management racing game. Players utilize travel cards that match upcoming terrain to move forward, and special action cards to assist them in their quest, or thwart their opponent.

name: Comic Book Boom!
description:
In Comic Book Boom!, you play as a publisher at the heights of the 1990's comic book craze, looking to make your fortune in the booming market. Whoever makes the most cash by the time the boom busts is the winner.

There are three kinds of cards you'll collect and use throughout the game:


Books – The comics titles that you publish. The amount you can profit from a book is its Collectibility × its Readership. Many Books are lacking Collectibility, Readership, or both, but have trendy '90s Themes, like "Cyborg" or "Motorcycle", that you can manipulate to achieve higher profits.



Stunts – Attention-grabbing plots, like "Crossover" or "All-New Look", that Hype up a Book's Themes. Hype drives those Themes higher and higher up the shared Market Board, reaching increasing levels of Readership. If you get too greedy and overhype a Theme, though, Books with that Theme will get canceled and won't turn any profit.



Enhancements – Manufacturing gimmicks, like Foil Covers or Holograms, that add Collectibility to a Book.


Comic Book Boom! is played over several rounds. Each round is made up of 5 phases that are played simultaneously:

1. Research – Pay money to acquire new a Book, Stunt, or Enhancement card. Research as many times as you'd like, but the cost grows along with your hand.

2. Develop – Secretly plan out your line, playing new cards facedown and adding Stunts and Enhancements onto your Books.

3. Publish – Reveal your Books and move their Themes up the Market Board based on how much Hype they have.

4. Profit – Cancel any overhyped Books, losing any cards on them and moving the Bubble up the Market Board. Make money from the rest of your Books based on their Collectibility and Readership.

5. Cleanup – Get ready for the next round by picking up your temporary (Stunt and Enhancement) cards, moving the Bubble up the Market Board, and resetting the Themes down to the Bubble's level.

The game ends after Cleanup if the Bubble reached "Burst" on the Market Board or if any player went bankrupt. Whoever has the most money wins. Otherwise, you'll start a new round with another Research phase.

-description from publisher
categories: Card Game, Comic Book / Strip, Economic
mechanics: Hand Management, Income, Programmed Movement, Push Your Luck, Real-Time, Slide/Push, Tags, Victory Points as a Resource

name: Ent'nous autres!: 18+
description:
Ent’nous autres! is a game that tests the complicity that reigns within a group of players.

To score points, players will have to choose the person who most closely matches each statement. Through the 3 games offered, the players who have the best knowledge of the others will score more points and win the game.

In this 18+ version, players will have to put aside their shyness and modesty. The ideal game to spark laughter, twisted discussions, but above all surprising revelations!

name: La Última Pirata
description:
It is clear that they are coming for you, will you be able to survive?

In the Last Pirate, life on the high seas is the best. Without rules or ties, in your numerous voyages you have lived countless adventures as a pirate crew. On the high seas you have realized that the gold from the treasure has disappeared and everyone is looking at you.

Choose a name for your pirate with which from now on the crew will address you, you will use the questions from the deck of cards to resolve the situations and try to survive.

Everything the cards say is true, so you'll have to use persuasion to save yourself.

Read the cards aloud.
The accused parties respond.
Vote and choose.

La Última is a narrative game system created by Roberto Alhambra.

An adventure with 30 cards, in which each of them will pose situations that you can only get rid of with your best arguments. The pirate trial begins. Will you end up being food for the sharks?

---

Está claro que van a por ti, ¿serás capaz de sobrevivir?

En la Última Pirata a vida en alta mar es la mejor. Sin reglas ni ataduras, en tus numerosos viajes has vivido incontables aventuras como tripulación pirata. En alta mar te has dado cuenta que el oro del tesoro ha desaparecido y todo el mundo te está mirando a ti.

Elige un nombre para tu pirata con el que a partir de ahora la tripulación se dirigirá a ti, usarás las preguntas del mazo de cartas para resolver las situaciones e intentar sobrevivir.

Todo lo que plantean las cartas es cierto, así que tendrás que usar la persuasión para salvarte.

Lee las cartas en voz alta.
Las partes acusadas responden.
Votad y elegid.
La Última es un sistema de juego narrativo creado por Roberto Alhambra.

Una aventura con 30 cartas, en las que cada una de ellas te planteará situaciones de las que solo podrás librarte con tus mejores argumentos. El juicio pirata comienza. ¿Acabarás siendo alimento para los tiburones?

name: La Última Cápsula
description:
The ship has suffered massive damage and only one escape pod remains. Will you be saved?

In the Last Capsule the surface of the Earth is in the worst state that human beings can remember. On the verge of collapse, humanity enters a new era: that of space colonization.

Your mission was to start a colony on a new planet, the future of humanity depended on it, but you will not be able to get there, most of the crew has already been evacuated, only a few remain...

Choose a name and an identification number as a crew member, you will use the questions from the deck of cards to resolve the situations and try to save yourself.

Everything the cards say is true, so you'll have to use persuasion to get selected.

Read the cards aloud.
The accused parties respond.
Vote and choose.

La Última is a narrative game system created by Roberto Alhambra.

An adventure with 30 cards, in which each of them will pose situations that you can only get rid of with your best arguments. You are facing the last evacuation capsule. You must decide who will be saved.

---

La nave ha sufrido daños masivos y solo queda una cápsula de escape. ¿Te salvarás?

En la Última Cápsula la superficie de la Tierra en el peor estado que el ser humano recuerda. Al borde del colapso, la humanidad entra en una nueva era: la de la colonización espacial.

Vuestra misión era comenzar una colonia en un nuevo planeta, el futuro de la humanidad dependía de ello, pero no vais a poder llegar, la mayoría de la tripulación ha sido ya evacuada, solo quedáis unos pocos…

Elige un nombre y un número de identificación como tripulante, usarás las preguntas del mazo de cartas para resolver las situaciones e intentar salvarte.

Todo lo que plantean las cartas es cierto, así que tendrás que usar la persuasión para que te seleccionen.

Lee las cartas en voz alta.
Las partes acusadas responden.
Votad y elegid.

La Última es un sistema de juego narrativo creado por Roberto Alhambra.

Una aventura con 30 cartas, en las que cada una de ellas te planteará situaciones de las que solo podrás librarte con tus mejores argumentos Estáis ante la última cápsula de evacuación. Debéis decidir quién se salvará.

name: Top of the World
description: Embark on an exciting journey around the globe as you delve into top 10 lists of the world and discover amazing facts about different countries and cultures. It's not just about having the knowledge - employ smart guesswork and strategic thinking to predict the top-ranked countries on each list and come out ahead of your opponents.

name: Jurassic Park: The Spy Game
description: Jurassic Park The Spy Game is a hidden role game in which players and their team will try to accomplish their mission to beat the rival team. Discover who deserves your trust in a battle of deceit, betrayal, and strategy. Will you be a daring spy, ready to steal valuable dinosaur embryos, or will you join the Jurassic Park staff team, trying to prevent a dire outcome? The excitement and suspense build as the game progresses! Will you achieve your goal?

name: Operación: Granja
description: Monte Perdido is a lost town but one that everyone has heard of at some point. Since the discovery of some mysterious stones and every ten years, in this humble and prosperous town they hold a contest among their countrymen to promote livestock and agriculture on their lands. To win the contest, participants will have to be able to combine the symbols of the mysterious stones in the most efficient way to be the first to build their farm, raise livestock, cultivate the garden, get a tractor to work on the land and some farmers who are in charge of maintaining and managing the farm. Operación Granja is a very fun and addictive roll and write game in which players combine two mystery stones (ten-sided dice) to obtain money or resources to build their farm. It has two game modes: an "easy mode" in which players perform addition and subtraction to obtain coins and an "advanced mode" where players perform multiplications with the dice to obtain the money and resources necessary to buy the different farm elements.

name: Cultists & Cthulhu (2nd Edition)
description:
In Cultists & Cthulhu, you lead a Cthulhu cult bent on completing nefarious rites while beset by incompetent underlings, meddling kids, and imminent madness.

Cultist cards are the cornerstones of your plans, who must roll custom dice turn by turn to progressively complete Rituals. Madness, of course, is never far away. Each Ritual completed contributes points toward the 21 total needed to win.

Although each cult is primarily trying to complete its own rituals, gameplay is decidedly of a "take-that" nature, with many player activities devoted to harming the other players' attempts to carry out their objectives.

—description from the publisher

name: Umbradeco
description:
Decorate the sky.
Arrange colorful umbrellas all over the sky.

Collect points by aligning colors in the same row, interacting with many colors, and pushing out other umbrellas.
However, the same colors should not be placed next to each other.

Why don't you use a five-colored umbrella to brightly color the sky?

The game is based on a festival called the "Umbrella Sky Project" in Portugal.
In order to be close to the actual scenery, it is based on the rule that "the same color is not adjacent".
The last is also a beautiful looking game.

name: PIXEL Aventures: L'île au forban
description:
Rediscover the thrill of exploration and the point'n'click video games of your youth with this Pixel Adventures! A wild Seychelles island, an ancient pirate treasure, secret codes, a paranoid uncle, a missing woman! Will you come back alive and rich? Cleverly combine locations and items from your inventory to unlock passages and complete your quest!

In this cooperative game, you choose together which actions to carry out. Search for clues or objects. Use objects to try to move forward. Explore new locations.

Your time is limited, and you'll have to solve several objectives. You'll lose if you don't get far enough in the adventure. But even if you complete the objectives, you'll still have to choose what to take back to the island. And your choices will determine the end of the story.

—description from the publisher
categories: Card Game, Deduction, Exploration, Video Game Theme
mechanics: Action Points, Deduction, Narrative Choice / Paragraph

name: 秘密の赤 (Red Secret)
description:
